status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2vlia","text":"Mix the following to give 1 ml of 5x Isothermal Buffer:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"212u","text":"450Â Î¼l 50% PEG 8000","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dp9l1","text":"250Â Î¼l 2M Tris-HCl pH 7.5","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6u5l4","text":"100Â Î¼l 500 mM MgCl2","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":18,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cr13a","text":"50Â Î¼l 1M DTT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4o3h6","text":"100Â Î¼l 50 mM NAD","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"390j3","text":"10Â Î¼l each of 100 mM ATP, CTP, GTP and TTP (PCR grade)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dt353","text":"10Â Î¼l sterile water","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b3b0j","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ca6j5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"","data":{"can_edit":1,"cas_number":"","guid":"41068878341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","in_steps":null,"linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"Deoxynucleotide Solution Set - 25 umol of each","public":0,"rrid":"","sku":"N0446S","url":"https://www.neb.com/N0446","vendor":{"id":2,"image":{"placeholder":"/img/vendors/2.png","source":"/img/vendors/2.png"},"link":"https://www.neb.com/","name":"New England Biolabs"}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5bfjt","text":"Preparation: You need to have prepared two or more fragments of DNA which you wish to recombine, and which have 25-40 nucleotideÂ homologous regions at their ends. For example, this could be a linearised vector and a PCR product which has sequences corresponding tot he ends of the linearised vector introduced via the primers.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"o7ks","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9u02q","text":"Mix the fragments to be assembled in equimolar ratios in a total volume of 5Â Î¼l. Add this mixture to one 15Â Î¼l aliquot of Gibson Master Mix.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2lj7m","text":"Incubate the reaction in a 50Â°C water bath or in a PCR machine at 50Â°C Â for one hour.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"pjp5","text":"Use 2-10Â Î¼l of the assembly reaction for a bacterial transformation.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Recombining DNA by Gibson Assembly
